Blog.post: Hey all I'm really tired and I'm sitting here in study hall checking up on my friends blogs. I just finished reading urlLink Alex's blog and I would like to say that I pretty much agree with what I read on there about the media today. Especially what it feeds to the girls of today. I mean I was at Easton and I saw a group of 10 year old girls in tub tops and tons of make up and if that doesn't show you the effect the media is having on girls today I don't know what will. I know that I sure won't let my little 10 year old going about in a tub top and make up looking a like a hoe! I mean seriously what has this world come to when every one is pressured to have sex of some sort even if it isn't "technically sex". News flash for you all it's sex. I have said this earlier when I talked about love or lust how most people today confuse them don't you'll end up messing up a part of your life that you can't get back! Just think about it.

Great expectations is a dumb and worthless book. The ending bites and so does the rest of the book. Maybe I just don't have a fine taste for good literature or maybe I'm right and the book stinks. I finished reading it today in class and I was like we have spent the last two months of school reading Great expectations for what! A stupid ending and a bunch of vocab words I'll never use. It's so frustrating.
BORED and TIRED not a good combo in school. Kylie and I have decided that WE MISS YOU JUSTIN!!!(kemper) And that if we could go and relive the concert and later on that night we would do so. :0)

Hey all, last night I went to the Linkin Park, Hoobastank, POD, and Story of the Year concert and it was wicked awesome( hahaha). I went with Justin, Kylie , Alyssa, and Marie. The only band that really sucked was POD. I bought this awesome Hoobastank shirt. YAY. We got home about 11 30, and since the roads were so bad everybody just spent the night. We started to watch The Labyrinth but people got tired so Alyssa went and crashed on the couch and Marie in the den. So Kylie, Justin and I went and talked in my sister's room where Justin was sleeping. We stayed up till like 3 30. I was a great time though. I think we are all really tired though so I'm going to go ill write later.
YAY Linkin Park, Hoobastank, POD and Story of the Year concert today. YAY JUSTIN, KYLIE, Alyssa, Marie and me

My aunt's wedding to Jim was very small just family. It was a very nice wedding. I now have two new cousins, David and Katie. My Aunt Michele was really happy. My sister and mom sang at the wedding and it was very pretty. I'm really tired though so ill write more I think tomorrow. Later

The lock in was a pretty good time. I played racket ball with Kylieand hung out and talked a ton with Alex and Kylie. Over all it was a fun night. I got in at 8 this morning and my sister woke me up at 10 30!! Then I have to go to my aunts wedding today. hmmm it's going to be a long day. But tomorrow is the Linkin Park, Hoobastank, POD, and story of the year concert so YAY YAY YAY for that!!!!!!! Well I'm really tired so I'm going to go. Later
YAY LOCK IN TONIGHT YAY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!GET TO HANG WITH ALEX AND KYLIE YAY. AND RICHIE!!

I never got the point of learn Bible verses cause we don't remember them for the rest of our lives. I mean honestly kids learn them 20 mins before their test then forget them by next week. If I'm going to learn a verse I'm going to want it to be something that applies to my life or that speaks to me! Like right now my favorite verse is Psalm 119:66 "teach me knowledge and good judgment, for I believe in your commands." I think that this is a verse worth teaching cause it's simple but yet if you are a Christian it applies to your life in that you should want to do what is right in God's eyes.
bored during study hall. hmmmm.. what to do what to do. well tonight should be fun im going to the lock in for the rock as a "leader" lol well i need to go befoe mr. mac see me later

Friends Friends, I think is it what helps get or have gotten us through middle and high school. Having good friends can be one of the most important things in someone's life. I mean if you hang out with the wrong set of people they could help in steering you down a path you don't want to take and pressure you into doing things you don't want to do. I have an awesome set of close friends!! I mean Kylie is my number one girl and I love her to pieces and can tell her almost anything. Alex is my closest guy friends and I trust him and he trusts me and that is a very important thing with close friends. I mean honestly if I didn't have my close friends I probably wouldn't be here right now. I mean that in all honesty. Kylie has helped me through so much stuff from school to boys and I feel kinda bad for her to have to go through all that stuff with me but she is my best friend and has always stuck by me. So I LOVE YOU KYLIE YOU'RE MY BEST FRIEND EVER!!!!! Richie is good when I need a laugh. He is a little insane at times but hey what can you do he is Richie. Well I don't know I have a lot of friends but I'm only writing about a couple today. I almost forgot one but yeah Renea she is my little friend and almost knows to much for her own good I sometimes think. I can trust her with stuff in all confidentiality. Ok I'm done later.
This is dumb but take it if you want to supposedly im and outcast according to this, urlLink Which Highschool Stereotype are you

Chevelle I've been listening to Chevelle a lot lately and I really like a ton of there songs some of my favorite is probably urlLink The Red. I like it cause its an interesting song with a subliminal Christian message behind it. Later

Spiritually emphases week sucks!! I mean we have to go to chapel every day and the speaker this year isn't even interesting I'm sorry. I really haven't liked any of the chapels this year to be honest. I mean they bring in these speakers they are like" this man is an amazing man of God" no doubt he is but that doesn't mean that he is interesting and that we have to listen to him do we. Well I'm going to go later
Richie came over today it was interesting. We watched the waterboy and chilled. He wasnt that bad most of the time. well im going to go now. ill right later. bye bye

Today my dad bought me this crazy colored daisies ( blue green yellow orange purple) and my sister ( she is awesome)got me some clam chowder and some lime popsicles. I was happy just thought I would write about that. Later

I was watching Daria today. I love that show its soo funny. They were talking about Romeo and Juliet. Daria was teaching a class and one of the students was like you agree that Romeo was a crazy guy in tights who was stalking the girl he met at the party to then. I was just like that is just funny that anyone would think of the story in that way even though its a tragedy. Well email me at punkchique53@aol.com if you have any comments like always.

oral surgery I have oral surgery today. It went fine. My mouth isn't nearly as sore as I expected it to be. I haven't done much of anything today except lay around watch movies and sleep. Well thanks to all of you who were praying for me. If you have any comments e-mail me at punkchique53@aol.com
please pray for me! Because tomorow morning at 8 I'm going to have oral surgery done. Even if you read this after that time please pray for the pain that will come afterwards. Thank you

Confession Jeff talked about confession tonight at church. How we should not just confess to God but to other people the sins that we are struggling with. And as I was listening I felt a strong pull to confess not really to people but just to God and just to be open with Him, even though He already knows about it. The reason I think God wasn't calling me to confess to people like Jeff had said to do was because He knew it was something I first needed to confess to Him. I think that He also knew I didn't really trust any of the people we were suppose to go and confess our sins to 'cause I don't really know or have a friendship with any of them. So yeah I think that what Jeff was teaching was a good concept but that it is not the only way God forgives or helps people heal. So yeah that's all I'm going to type on that.

What is LOVE? Love or Lust? According to 1 Corinthians 13:5 love is not self seeking, is not rude, is not easily angered, and does not keep records of wrongs. So why in today's culture is "love" something some guys use to try and make there girlfriends have sex with them if its not self seeking? "ill know you really love me if you have sex with me" that's such bull that is self seeking and rude. So obviously its not the love the Bible is talking about! The "love" that is portrayed in America today is not love most of the time its lust! And its every where in the media. I watched 4 movies on Friday and every single one had a scene that was a sex scene or implied that the people had sex and almost every time after the people would be like "I love you". This makes me mad cause sex is something to be shared between two people who are married and only those people who are married. That's the way God intended it to be. Like and Love two different things When you love someone is unconditional supposedly. I mean kids my age sometimes do not like their parents but still love them all the same cause they are their parents. But that is a different type of love then "I love you" and even in that case I don't think that you always like the person. I mean I bet there have been times when my parents didn't like each other for things said or something done but they still loved each other. So when kids who date each other for like a week are like " I am so in love with him or her" its normally not true. I mean I would say that I am guilty of saying that before. But now that I have come to this conclusion I don't think I will so openly use the word love towards people. Except if I'm talking about the Christian sense of loving people in which we are suppose to love everyone like we love ourselves. But I'm defiantly going to think about it before I use the phrase "I love you" with some one again. Think about it if you have any comments write me at punkchique53@aol.com later
YAY!!!!!!!! I finsihed my book. it was really good. ok later

I've transfered my site to this one at the request of Amy and Richie cause it was to hard to get to before or something like that. So this is will be the new spot to check on my life if you want or to read my opinions about stuff. Hmmm.. kinda sounds like my last site. ok well i dont really have much to write about. The most exciting things that have happend are kylie coming over to celerbrate midterms being over. YAY and going to see Big Fish with alex, kylie, richie, dan, amy and I. i was a good movie kinda of confusing but hey what can i expect cause kylie kept talking to me about the twins in it. o well i dont really have much to talk about so ill post later

Valentines and Homecoming On Saturday Justin came to visit me. This made me very happy we watched movies and went to the mall to buy kylie her birthday present. hehe I also had HC on that day and it was interesting. I liked my dress a lot it was red. Most of the girls wore these black long dresses. I'm now going out with Justin since sat. Well ill write later

So hey I'm back again sitting in my study hall wear my pj's cause it's pajama day! Well this past weekend was a good one over all. Justin came to visit me on Saturday morning and we watched the labyrinth( that movie rocks) Fifle Goes West, and Romeo and Juliet ( the new one). We had a good time just chillin watching movies in the den. Then after he left my friend Emily called and we went to Kohls where I got her to buy this cute girly shirt which is a big accomplishment if you know Emily. After that we went out to eat and then to church were I got to see Alex!! I was really excited cause I hadn't seen him in like 2 or 3 weeks. Richie and my cousin started fighting and being dumb during the service and it got really annoying. The only bad part about that night was the fact that Alex was grounded so we couldn't go anywhere afterwards. But it all turned out to be ok I went home with my sister and we made cookies. We made lots of little heart shaped ones and then a big flower and a big shamrock cookie they rocked. On Sunday I went to VCDC and I had to be there at 8 20 ( grrr) cause my parents were playing on the worship team. After church I went home and ate lunch then my dad took me to the mall to get the final things for my HC dress. I got this rocken shoes for only like 16 bucks and a pair of fishnets. On Sunday night I went to worship practice and it was ok nothing special except for maybe watching the boys play Halo on the projector. hehehe well I'm going to go ill write later peace out.

sorry i haven't writen in awhile i have been busy with different stuff. homecoming is in a week and i decided to go. my friend justin is going to go with me.i have an awesome dress which i love hehehe. i get to see alex for the first time in like 2 weeks tomorow and i get to see justin too tomorow. I'm also going to help emily with her homecoming outfit and stuff it should end up being a fun day. well i need to go ill try to write tomorow night. bye all

WINTER RETREAT Hey I got back from the VCDC winter retreat today and it was awesome. I had so much fun. I loved just being able to hang out with all my friends and chill. We went sledding but I didn't stay outside to long I really wet when I wiped out. The worship was awesome and the food wasn't half bad either:0) One of the best times was when we tried to play hacky sack. It was hilarious we all were really bad at it. "All the hackies came out of the sack" Brandon We read this book called The Dream Giver and then discussed it instead of having a normal teaching session and I really enjoyed that even though at the end of some of the sessions I got a little insane and wouldn't sit down. I was kinda insane. The book was good and was talking about the dreams God has for all of us and how it is up to us to follow God and the dreams he has for us. And that he will help us when ever we need and call out for his help. Our group had a good talked and conversation about it from what I could tell when I was paying attention. I got this really really cool green coat from Holly (she is one of the youth leaders at VCDC) for nothing so I gave her a new pair of toe socks cause she really wanted some. lol . I'll write later God Bless

I hate anger! I hate fighting! I hate the way my mind processes it! I feel like crying and I haven't done anything wrong, why is this? WHY? I want to go back to Saturday. Every thing was good on Saturday.

Legolas Greenleaf If I were a character in The Lord of the Rings , I would be Legolas, Elf, a son of the King of Mirkwood. In the movie, I am played by Orlando Bloom . Who would you be? Zovakware Lord of the Rings Test with Perseus Web Survey Software

I just got back from the youth confrence. It was awesome, in the true sense of the word for Matt Redman. God was truely there. Harvey Carey was amazing last night. Matt Redman was great as usual. I had a fabulous time hanging out with my friends. I walked a ton this weekend, so I'm very tired :0) Matt's workshop was very good I think he had very good points on writing songs. That man is truely blessed by God. I haven't really been home for the past 2 days, but they have still rocked my socks off. I'm really tired though so yeah I'm going to go much love to you all. later Yanni's rocks!!! Any ? or coments email me at punkchique53@aol.com

Yesterday was the true begging of my spring break which I have and know will be very boring except for the confrence, I cant wait. Ok well yesterday lets see was pretty boring during the day, cause i didn't do much. That night was ok I went to church and Kylie and Alex were there which always adds up to being a good time. Alex got Kylie to eat ferilizer by telling her it was salt, it was a very mean thing to do if I do say so. Well yeah anyways after church I came home and had all these weird dreams. The wierdest was I had to be Hilary Duff's voice over cause the director thougth she had a anoying voice and I also had to sing the theme song or soemthing it was strange. Yeah well there were a lot of them. who know I guess I just have weird thought. o well today was boring too I cleaned the basement. And listened to Lost Prophates, who ROCK I must say. ok later all much love

Hey yeah i havent really had time to write there has been too much going on in my life. IT'S DRIVING ME CRAZY. Well I'm only going to write about my busy day. Saturday- Justin came over. enough said right. all im going to say about him is the more he talks the more i'm glad i broke up with him and i know some of you might think thats a little harsh but its true i mean on saturday he said some stuff that pissed me off. majorly when he would talk about alex. man that boy makes me mad. well anyways he tells me that he is still coming in for walking it out which means he is staying the night at my house with me and kylie. so yeah after i hung out with him that day i went to church. which was such a nice relief. thank you to all my friends (kylie and renea mainly) who were there for me too talk to. Well after church Ed ,Chris, Kylie, Alex, and I went to go and see Hildago it was ok. wasn't the best movie I had seen but my night was pretty good :) except for when i got home past my curfew and i had forgotten to call so my mom was really mad. Lucky i didnt get grounded and just got a warning but next time i will be for a week. scary yes. well im going to go cause this is getting to long I'll write soon. later

Hey all i went to the Rock for like the first time in a couple of months. hehe i went to visit renea i love that gurl. well the worship was good very intament and such if you can really have that with middle schoolers. well yeah i dont really have much to write about today. play practice went well. and all if good in my world. Jesus loves you hehe and all the little children too. later " and lo, I dream of YOU" amy larwence ( adventures of Tom Saywer)

Hey all today was a dun dun dun SNOW DAY!!!! I love Snow days. well today was kinda boring but I went to hang out with my friend ashley, which was cool. But beside that all I've really done is sleep which is good. yes very good.hehe well I got to go but ill write later. peace and much love to all.
Pray for my grandma she is having quadruple bypass surgery today. ONLY a week and 2 days till walking it out . YES score 1 !!!!!

Hey all Today I had kinda a ruff begging but the end was good. yay I love happy endings hehe I got my poetry project. Yes!! I went to church and I really liked Jeff's teaching it was about knowing the living God and stuff and it was really short and then we had a long extended worship session which I loved. Well yeah ok I broke up with Justin to inform you all. Yeah well spring break starts in less than 5 days score 1. " I choked on my egg roll", Alex Petit ( he is a beautiful man inside and out) haha
Hey all life is confusing and tiring.. what to do what to do...... yawn.... im sleepy... well play practice went well today. ill try later. bye all

Hey all I felt sick today (my stomach hurt) so i stayed home from school. Also i was really tired and need to sleep and think. So yeah i cleaned my room( shocker i know)! I went to church last night it was interesting and fun so yeah. well boys im not going to talk about. just i have one thing to say that if you all would be praying for me i have some decisions and stuff i need some help from God with. thanks and love ya all. later

This weekend. This weekend i did nothing on friday and then on sat justin came over and we hung out for like 14 hours and it was cool. we went to the ohio state hockey game and they won by one point in the last min it was a good game. well then i went to VCDC today and yeah that was ok. I went to the health expo and that was scarey.... enough said. I made dinner for my parents, amanda , andy and carrie. It was really good too. Well school is tomorow and play practice starts. Ill write later. peace

Hey all!!!!!! Im sorry i haven't writen in forever. I have had so much going on between my past two projects. grrr Mrs.Johnson makes me so mad! her stupid assignment the 25 poems. Ok so besides that I got into my school play , which is The Adventures of Tom Sawyer the Broadway Musical. I play Amy Lawrence, Becky's best friend. I don't have a many lines. Today in school we watched a movie about bullies... it was interesting and was suppose to help us see what people do when they make fun of others in hope to change our school. But i know better than that cause ive heard it a million times but nothing ever changes. Like the main kid who picks on kids was making fun of the man in video afterwards which proves my point. ok well... change of subject. Justin and me are still going out and i know many of you will be like what happened to alex. well to be honest alex is still my best guy friend and i still love hanging with him and stuff. It's just that alex wasn't even thinking about dating me until he was 16. And i liked justin and justin likes me back so we started dating after HC and yeah.... so enough about boys. I havent seen kylie in a couple of weeks cause she is doing a play. which i think im going to go and see on sunday. Tomorow Jusitn is coming to visit me. We are going to hang all day and then go to a hockey game with my parents that night. Well im going to go. Ill try to write more. love to you all. later

Hey all this week has been so busy. I've been sick, had projects due, and its been hell/ tech week for the play. I have to go for 8 hours to school tomorow, I think I'm going to die, then hopefully to church and maybe hang afterwards with some friends. Well I'll talk to you all later. much love.
Why is it sometimes the hardest to differ between the truth and a lie about the people you think you know best? And why do you some times believe people you know are lying?

STUPID RULES On Friday I had to go to an assembly on PDA and how you shouldn't act in jest about homosexuallity. It was the most stupid thing i have ever been to in my life. we are now not aloud to hug anyone and you can't hold hands with anyone enless you are dating them and all this crap and i started thinking its normal for girls to give eachother hugs or hold hands just being friends or acting stupid it doesnt mean anything so Todd ( the man) is freaking out about such crap that doesn't make any sense at all. He is an insane sex freak in my eyes and i can't stand the sight of that man he makes me sick to my stomach. He is one of my many reasons i will probably leave tree next year. he considers him self to be all great and superior in everything to his students and crap. He always thinks that others are wrong and that he and his church are the only ones that are right. well ok back to my point.... as you can see i changed the title of my blog, and for all of you that are wondering why it manly has to do with my school and the way most of the world looks a teenagers. They have this look as if we are left alone to make our own choices or do any thinking for ourselves we might destroy everything they have worked so hard to inflect upon us for the past years of our life. And most parents not mine either have no clue whats happening in thier childs life, dont care or think that they are having sex drinking and doing drugs and thats all. Parents talk about how tv effects our minds and how the media influences us, well a news flash to all of you it works on you too. Where else do you think you got the idea that your kids were doing all of those past things besides from maybe ur mistakes but even if not you still judge your kids or there friends based on words of mouth or just even taking a look at them. I mean i know a parent that just because some one has pierceings or tattoos and assumes that they are having sex and doing drugs just by looking at them. STOP ALREADY let your kids make there own choices for a while and test there judgement. I bet most of your kids dont have that bad of it, Unless Candy is reading this then watch your son more carefully. Sorry Richie its true. Ok back to the beging point people think that by setting the rules that they do on kids like Todd did on us that we will be better kids and obey them. The truth is most of the time the more you restrict your kids the more they want to rebel against the stupid rules that you try and stick on them. So try and trust your kids for a while and you might be suprised. And for all you people my age, if your parents do give you trust dont let them down by doing totally stupid stuff. SMOKING is gross dont do it. ok im done for the day any comments email me at punkchique53@aol.com
yeah i wont write today im really mad and if the person i am mad at can think why good for them. later
Word of advice be careful of the words you use.....and the things you say/type.

Hey all, my life isn't really that interesting. So why then do people still read my blog? Home... O well and update on my little part of the world. Went to church last night it was a good time. Then afterwards I had to go to my grandma's which I hate to say I hate doing. She always in a big problem or has to have some surgery done and it all has to be right away. She constantly talks about herself and her problems and really that's about it. She always interrupts people. Grr she makes me upset. So yea moving on I'm really sore cause I slept wrong last night so my shoulders are killing me .:0( O well Kylie's had to leave church last night right afterwards cause her brother got jumped. Kylie I hope they are doing ok call me or e-mail me and give me an update. Well yea boys same as how its been or the past month nothing new. Know what show I love right now My So Called Life. Its a great show and yeah it's great. haha The N rocks my world well yeah I'm in study hall and have other things to do cause I'm a busy person or so I would have you to believe. I'll write later. Much Love to you all. any thing you want to say drop me an e-mail at punkchique53@aol.com :0)
Yesterday I went to the rock and gave Alex and Ed their Birthday presents early. Happy Birthday to you both, love you guys. hehe well yeah I think they liked them so all is good in the world later.

IM SORRY I haven't written in awhile life has been crazy lattly with play practice, friends, school and boys. haha.I have had a crazy week working my term paper and practicing for the play which is May 6, 7 , and 8th at Tree Of Life HighSchool for any of y'all you would want to come and see it. :0) Well yeah I've been at VCC at lot lattly but not at VCDC sorry to you all, but i dont think many of you if any at all read this so it doesn't really matter. hehe. well I had a Great day i skipped school and hung out with my dad all day. YAY. I love me dad he rocks. hehe. we went to the columbus museum of art and saw the exhibit on the Buddhist art and on Monnet. It was very cool. I hadn't been down there in years. Then after we went to lunch at the radio cafe down in bexley, they have great sandwhichs. My sister had her hearing today that my dad was playing in so I went to that with him. She did a great job. After we returned some stuff for my mom and went to Panara and then to Rag-O-Rama. Where i got this awesome pair of jeans and 2 new shirts yay. Well yeah I haven't done much this weekends besides school, church and hanging with my dad. I'll try to write more often. Boys update- umm anyone who has talked to me knows whats going on in my head. hehe later

hey i know it's been awhile since i've blogged but i've been busy with balancing school, church, friends and sleep. Play practice is going well and with less than a month until the show things are a little bit on edge. for any one who wants to come the shows are may 6 7 8. but yeah anyways today was a fun day for reasons i can not say all i have to say is good thing you covered my eyes alex. haha well tomorow is easter and it'g going to be a long day. I have off monday and thats a good thing.... i think . later all

Hey all yesterday was good. Alex and andrew came over to go thrifting. then I went to church afterwards alex ed josh and i went to WoW to hang with people. It was pretty much a good day my brain is full of new thoughts. maybe a motorcycle haha. later
I hope my dreams aren't prophetic later

Hey all just got back from playing at church with alex and richie. Alex is getting better, you just need to relax buddy. Richie that was lovely bass playing haha. I wish we could have gotten Jesse's sound to work this morning but o well you can't change the past. Over all it was pretty good. Good Work everyone. byebye
urlLink I'm Rachel Green from Friends! urlLink Take the Friends Quiz here. created by urlLink urlLink stomps . haha I'm me.
I found out today that I wont be leaving as soon as I thought I would for New Hampshire. Instead I'm leaving at the end of June or in July. So Ill be around for a little bit longer.
Well I really have nothing to say.....

Keep it all to yourself If you don't tell anyone anything you can't get hurt, right? Then you can be whoever you want. Do whatever you want.... But would it be genuine? Most likely not... But who cares right you can't get hurt.

Friends people say are the most important thing a teenager can have in there life. So why is it that friends are normally what gets us down or hurts us? True the feeling of having no friends or none that you can trust can drive some people mad, but sometimes it's better not to share and to hid. The Worst feeling in the world is not knowing your "best friends" or having the feeling that they have been lying to you. These are the types of things that make people like me depressed.

Afraid Of Emotions Why are so many people afraid to be nice, or show that they care at all? Not caring... My friend once told me the way to maintain your relationships with people was not to care, so then are they really relationships at all then? 'Cause if you don't care about what happens to those people or those relationships then its not really a relationship to begin with. I will admit that sometimes I care to much what is going on in my friendships and I let myself get carried away in it but I think that it can be better than not trying/caring at all. Think about it...

I'm going to be working all summer apparently. First my three weeks as a nanny is Jaffery Center New Hampshire, then I might go and work for/with these artists that are friends of the family. My dad thinks it will be good for my college application and that I will learn a ton which i suppose to be true. Well I need the money so I'm not complaining. I hope to get my temps some time this month..... On Friday I had a half day of school Jenny and Steve came over and we went down to campus. It was a pretty good time I got two new cds and a huge poster of Johnny Depp, which if you ask Kylie is a wonderful thing to wake up to in the morning.hahaha. Saturday Kylie came over and we went to church. Then after went with Ed, and alex to see Van Helsing. Which is a horrible movie. The acting of the "evil creatures" is horrible and the music is just cheesy and in the wrong place. I was happy to have kylie over she hasn't been over in a long time to stay the night.YAY, for best friends. Well my mind is a crazy place that I have decided needs to be cleared so before I leave for NH. Summer is a time for teenagers to breath, get a good long break, clear our minds and relax. Later
Politics- really means many blood sucking creatures when translated from Latin and I suppose it's true.

Hey all just got back from the first true preformance of the play. one down two more to go. Tomorow a have a group of friends coming out to support me so that should be fun. I'm tired and I miss having a social life outside of my play..... if you can call it that. Well only one more day in the hot mess that is my school and I'm out for the weekend. yay!!!!
